Hello Experts,
I am new to junit/cactus. I have configured the framework to write JUnit/Cactus test cases. However I can work very well with JUnit, But when I am trying to run cactus test case I am getting following error:
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpRecoverableException: Error in parsing the status line from the response: unable to find line starting with "HTTP"
Please find attached 'doc' which describes this error in detail. It's very difficult to come out of this exception. Please help.
Thanks in advance,
Nishant...
